DECLARE
PROCEDURE UPDATE_INSR_ST
  (NIPRNAIC ORG.NAIC_ID%TYPE,
  NIPROLDLIC INSR_ST.ST_LIC_NBR%TYPE,
  NEWLIC INSR_ST.ST_LIC_NBR%TYPE,
  STATE INSR_ST.ST_CD%TYPE)
  is
  BEGIN
    FOR NEXT_ORG IN (SELECT ORG_ID FROM ORG WHERE ORG.NAIC_ID = NIPRNAIC)
    LOOP
      UPDATE INSR_ST SET ST_LIC_NBR = NEWLIC 
      WHERE ORG_ID = NEXT_ORG.ORG_ID  AND ST_CD=STATE AND trim(ST_LIC_NBR) = NIPROLDLIC;
    END LOOP;
  END UPDATE_INSR_ST;
 
BEGIN
